name: Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game Full
description:
Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game
Welcome to the construction room! This is a place where you take this colorful pixel blocks and compile them into the unusual flying craft of any shape you want! You can combine different types of blocks to get different effects – turbo mode, engine longevity and so on. When you end up here, go to this door. There you could test your creation in real conditions! Unleash your imagination with Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game!
Build your own cubical hovercraft vehicle, fly over the road and become the best out-of-road racer in the World of Cubes! Ride across the streets of pixel cities, avoid buildings and other crafts, and get the best results! Race ahead through the city traffic, dodge counter vehicles and feel as a racer and constructor the same time! Create your own crafts with Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game!
Choose the right combination of blocks’ colors to achieve the best result! Combine your creativeness with a tactical genius to get more speedy craft! Earn coins to enlarge your craft capacity and unlock power-up and new types of blocks.
Create the most impressive and fastest hovercraft in the World of Cubes and become a champion of street racing!.
Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game features:
Different types of blocks – create different combinations and choose the best of them
Original crafting mode – your only limit is your imagination
Various interesting treks
Unusual views of pixel city
Many unlockable power-up and pixel blocks – collect all of them
Do you like racing and driving simulators? Check Hovercraft 3D – Car Building Game – combination of racing and construction genres!
